text.ebm.stowing: Throws any raw, ore, or cobble items onto the ground in front of you
text.ebm.searching: Allows searching for items in chests around you
text.ebm.sealing: Puts slabs and stairs back together
text.ebm.raising: extends structures with the block in your offhand (Like a builders wand)
text.ebm.exchange: Replaces the type of block you click on with the type in your offhand
text.ebm.deconstructing1: unpolishes and unbricks things that are otherwised polished or bricked
